headline: Ask HN: Deep tracing of a JavaScript object usage across the codebase
description:
I am trying to construct schema of an api call response, made inside the code, based on the usage of the response object inside the code.

Since this is a javascript code base there is no defined schema for the response object. To construct the response schema, i am planning to parse the entire codebase into AST, and traverse the usage (to multiple level) of the response object to find its usage, there by I would be able to reconstruct the actual schema.

Can you refer me to any existing tool/implementation/methodology to achieve this.

It will be great how you will approach this problem
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 对整个代码库中的JavaScript对象使用情况进行深度追踪
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 對整個代碼庫中的JavaScript對象使用情況進行深度追蹤
description_zh-Hans: 我正试图根据代码中响应对象的使用情况，构建代码中的api调用响应模式。为了构建响应模式，我打算将整个代码库解析为AST，并遍历响应对象的使用情况（到多个级别）以找到其使用情况，这样我就能重建实际的模式了。
description_zh-Hant: 我正試圖根據代碼中響應對象的使用情況，構建代碼中的api調用響應模式。為了構建響應模式，我打算將整個代碼庫解析為AST，並遍歷響應對象的使用情況（到多個級別）以找到其使用情況，這樣我就能重建實際的模式了。
